Review.Titre: Personal training Clients can’t set…
Review.Contenu: Personal training Clients can’t set recurring workoutsWhen ppl cancel class it doesn’t show up in the class only in the notifications Doesn’t allow me to schedule my small group personal training classes that start 30 mins after my first time so I have to add in a fake name so I can have ppl register on the 00 and 30 Not personal training friendly as the app stated when I purchased it.I’ll be looking for a new product in august

Review.Titre: Our personal training clients cannot…
Review.Contenu: Our personal training clients cannot schedule reoccurring sessions for themselves.  The trainer has to do it.  AlFor people who have reoccurring sessions the system will randomly send them 5 reminder emails in a row within 5 minutes time for sessions scheduled in the future.Clients are not sent reminders for their sessions.Not a useful tool for personal trainers.  Maybe group training but not personal training.

Review.Titre: I feel like I dealing with a lot of…
Review.Contenu: I feel like I dealing with a lot of bugs. I constantly have to be checking if my availability they are showing us correct

Review.Titre: My app crashes every week even after…
Review.Contenu: My app crashes every week even after the updates. My members have problems with linking up to their calendars and sometimes the kiosk doesn’t check in the member all the way creating an extra step for the member to reach to me to void the late cancellation fee.Would love a place for members to review classes so new clients could see what others are saying about the class.

Review.Titre: Overall an okay experience so far
Review.Contenu: I really appreciate the responses from the support team. They are typically fairly quick to reply. The overall app experience has been pretty good. We have had a lot of negative feedback about the financial side for clients. They don’t get receipts sent to them, which they don’t like and when their payment method needs to be updated, they can’t don it on their end as an automatic payment and that causes a lot of work for us. It’s not always the most user friendly to navigate and it seems there are a lot of little bugs being worked out. I’m happy with the price, but I have had a ton of people emailing because they don’t know how to do certain things or find us in the app, which is incredibly time consuming and frustrating for us. Would really like for there to be some improvements made as I like the team and concept of the app.

Review.Titre: I think for the price point
Review.Contenu: I think for the price point, Fit Degree is good. For my studio it is what I can afford now. The best thing about Fit Degree is the customer support. They get back to you right away and are super helpful. They also give you references with their answers. There are a few things I wish Fit Degree offered. Mainly, a way to sign children up under their parent profile. I have lots of kids classes. A lot children don't have their own email yet, which is required to sign up. If families have multiple children, this presents issues. They have to 1- figure out how to sign each kid up with different emails, and 2- make a profile for each kid which means if they want to sign up their 3 kids, they have to login and log out 3 different times to get all of their children signed up. This creates a lot of work for them. It's way too many steps.The other feature I would like to see is easier reporting. I want to see exactly who my monthly members are and have all of their emails in one place. I want to know in advance if someone is going to hit a milestone club count. I want an easier way to track monthly attendance by purchase. I think the Fit Degree team is great and I hope these changes will happen in the future.

Review.Titre: I think some things are great on the…
Review.Contenu: I think some things are great on the platform, but there are a lot of little glitches that can be frustrating. It should be more user friendly when it comes to registering for an account. Having a client register intentionally for  your business but you can't see them unless they actually click on something in the app is frustrating as a business owner. It sounds unprofessional to say "just click something and then I will be able to see you". That's an issue that happens AFTER having to list 15 steps for registration on a website (that no one reads and then I have 15 different areas that I have to cover to figure out where things went haywire in the process).  If someone is on the website or the app and clicks that they want to register for a class, that should be automatic once they pay and they shouldn't have to go follow up on it.  I will say the customer support is fantastic, unless it's the weekend and then you're going to have to wait until the next business day.Being a new customer, I feel like I will learn to resolve some of these issues, but it shouldnt take 15 steps to get connected to me regardless of whether I have those possible issues with each step committed to memory yet.

Review.Titre: Our onboarding experience was great and…
Review.Contenu: Our onboarding experience was great and the support team exceptional.  Our only reason for not giving 5 stars was our interactions with the payment processing team…Payabli.  There just needed to be more communication on this process and it’s timeframe.   iIt is definitely much better now as we have communicated our concerns and asked for more support.

Review.Titre: Like the software
Review.Contenu: Like the software. Things are answered in a timely manner but I would like to see more heads up on bugs. I’d rather know what happening than my clients come in and tell me. If I have missed those correspondence, then I would like to know where I can get those messages more promptly. I also had a question that I post on the Facebook group, and it was not published by the admin for some reason so no one saw it..

Review.Titre: Working Smarter!
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE has really helped me to work smarter, not harder for sure! Clients have been praising how easy and seamless it is to use as well. My only critiques are that it is taking me some practice to add availability and it takes a bit of extra work to configure partner sessions. Any questions - no matter how "small" - have been answered with a level of detail that is always helpful though so appreciate that!

Review.Titre: Even though it’s better than…
Review.Contenu: Even though it’s better than Mindbodyonline for SURE it takes way too much time to launch the app for both teachers and clients Also business owners there are still items missing

Review.Titre: I really enjoy the friendliness and…
Review.Contenu: I really enjoy the friendliness and dedication of the FitDegree staff. It makes customer service less stressful! However, it is tough when no one is around on the weekends if there are any urgent matters. I also think there are a few features that the app would benefit from - one being the ability to customize confirmation emails (our building is security coded, so it makes it difficult when we can’t put any further info in the confirmation email). Or, maybe have a section to write some studio info on the app by the phone number/address or something? The other feature that would be helpful is when a class is canceled, instead of having it disappear from the app, display it as “canceled”. But overall, I would highly recommend FitDegree. It’s been such a game changer for us!

Review.Titre: The number one thing I love about Fit…
Review.Contenu: The number one thing I love about Fit Degree is that the support team answers right away and is very helpful. I also appreciate that they listen to suggestions and work to make changes. The one thing I would really like is to have a parent account that they can add children to. I have a few kids classes and it is really difficult to make a profile for each kid because not all of them have emails or phone numbers. If they were under the parent account, I wouldn't have to worry about that. Then the parents could sign them up easily without having to log off their account and log into each kids account. I have parents who have 3 or 4 kids, and it is just so much work for them. I fear that they won't keep signing up because it is too much of a pain.

Review.Titre: I LOVE FitDGREE
Review.Contenu: Great customer service. A business that works to ensure we are working fluidly.  This tool has been great for me and my users. Prior to the pandemic, the customer service was top notch, so now it's even BETTER! They always respond quickly and work to make necessary changes.  I appreciate the constant updates, and changes made to the platform in order to streamline our processes. The reporting as aspect can still use some work but functions great for what I need now and does give me a great view of my business. This platform is EASY to use and understand on both our end and user end. I can see a lot more positive changes happening in the future and do not regret jumping on board with this smaller company.

Review.Titre: To be honest
Review.Contenu: To be honest, there are so many steps do everything. It is such a process. The app doesn’t always load. I would love more color features to be attached to classes. I wish the app had a different look to it too when viewing the classes. I’d love to see a weekly calendar as an option. I also would love to be able to change the classes on my phone vs logging into my account or computer. What’s great? Customer service is helpful and get back to me fairly quickly. The cost of using the service is fair.

Review.Titre: Fit Degree haas been an almost perfect…
Review.Contenu: Fit Degree haas been an almost perfect replacement of Mindbody for my studio. I really appreciate the support staff. they are quick with answers and to help me solve any issues. the software is easy to use. There are only a few things that I would like to see improvement on. I would like to be able to have joint accounts, especially for parents and children. I have a lot of kid programs. Parents with multiple children who are too young to have their own emails and phone numbers have to find other emails to sign up the children for class. This creates a lot of confusion and hassle. The other thing is sometimes there are glitches in the system that I nor the support staff can figure out. It is confusing for my students and for me. Other than that, I think Fit Degree is awesome and I recommend it to other studio owners all the time.

Review.Titre: Good start. Great customer service!
Review.Contenu: Navigating the back end on the computer is pretty easy. I appreciate that I don't have to pay extra to get all the features or when we get more members, and I like the social option that's available in the app.  There are some things I'd like to see, such as an icon to indicate if a student has an injury, the ability to close registration early, and to create an automatic "member" tag when a student becomes a member in order to do automatic discounts.  Overall positive experience as far as customer service goes: Easy to get a hold of and very responsive.  I really appreciate that I can send a quick email or talk to a real person.

Review.Titre: I switched from Zen Planner and I am SO…
Review.Contenu: I switched from Zen Planner and I am SO glad. This is an easy app/software for all my needs at the fair price. The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is I wish it could handle merchandise inventory.

Review.Titre: I have so many positive things to say…
Review.Contenu: I have so many positive things to say about fitDegree. Set up was easy. Customer service and tech support are fast and friendly. I live all of the videos that help guide you through the system.Widgets are great. Having the ability to separate the items on the schedule would be great for the website.  Being able to post an in studio schedule and then desperately post a virtual schedule. This would make it easier to grow and advertise and market specific schedules. There are a few functions that are clunky.I am getting use to it.  And it seems silly but the colors used in the on the go app are difficult to read. Black letters on blue background can be very difficult for color blind teachers to read. This is when checking attendance on up coming classes. I would like the ability to color code the classes on the schedule. This sounds like a lot but I am very happy with this software. It is easy to use and I have only had a few complaints that the app was difficult but that is usually user error,

Review.Titre: Scheduling on main site and fitdegree…
Review.Contenu: Scheduling on main site and fitdegree go has issues. It will show up on one and not on the other. Kind of a pain to be switching between both. I use Fitdegreego to be able to sync it to my calendar on google.

Review.Titre: Great software but often has issues…
Review.Contenu: Great software but often has issues with updates and freezing with loading screens.

Review.Titre: FitDEGREE is the best booking app my…
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE is the best booking app my business has ever used ( and believe me, we have used quite a few ). It is intuitive, less expensive than the others, and the staff is responsive. I’ve recommended it to friends.

Review.Titre: Try it, you'll like it.
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE has the best customer support. Real people with real experience. An all encompassing basic price for a great product that my customers love to use and fitDEGREE is always listening and making more features and improvements. What's not to love?

Review.Titre: Top notch support team!
Review.Contenu: The FitDegree support team is top notch! As a new business owner, I have a lot of questions and need to learn quickly. The support team is quick to reply, I always get replies within a day and typically within hours. And even better, the answers to my questions (whether it's a major question or something small) are thorough and solution oriented to meet my studio's needs.

Review.Titre: I’ve been using Fit Degree for over 3…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using Fit Degree for over 3 years and am very happy with it as our booking software! We are a Pilates studio with almost 200 members!

Review.Titre: Best choice for building community!
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE is an excellent choice for a small studio like ours since it connects our community while allowing us to operate our business. The app is excellent to promote classes and events plus it is easy for clients to book one-on-one sessions. We love the announcements on the app to reach our community directly without the noise of social media. Being part of the fitFam is an amazing support system plus the fitGuru podcasts are full of great tips to continue growing studio communities. Highly recommend this outstanding solution for studio and client management!

Review.Titre: Real people providing a personalized, exceptional service
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE seems too good to be true, but they’re the real deal. It’s an affordable service, has numerous valuable features, with outstanding customer service. Designed by fitness industry experts, user friendly on both ends. It just doesn’t get any better.

Review.Titre: I cannot brag enough on the customer…
Review.Contenu: I cannot brag enough on the customer service and overall fantastic experience I've had with Fit Degree. I get real help from a real person super fast when I need a solution or assistance. I feel like Fit Degree knows how deeply we care about our communities and the real issues we face as small business owners. The personal touch along with the tech savvy solutions have me sold!

Review.Titre: Nick and Ali from fitDGREE were…
Review.Contenu: Nick and Ali from fitDGREE were excellent to work with. Whenever I had questions about the app, they were super prompt on getting back to me with an answer. The recorded videos they would send were an added bonus.    fitDEGREE has that extra element of personal touch that I appreciate. I recommend fitDEGREE to anyone looking for a booking platform for their studio.

Review.Titre: Love FitDegree!!
Review.Contenu: Love FitDegree!!! Especially the personal care and connection you get with their support staff. I get quick responses, video walk throughs often times, and easy to follow and direct answers which makes my life so much easier. I’ve never looked back or regretted my decision to switch to them!

Review.Titre: Thanks for holding my hand...
Review.Contenu: I started my business during the Pandemic...and I was terrified of going online, etc. FitDegree held my hand, helped me bring my students on board (I have a large percentage of older adults who are not comfortable with technology) and they were GREAT.  Quick to respond, open to my suggestions and patient! It's been a great experience.

Review.Titre: FitDEGREE is awesome!
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE has truly helped to level up my small business - a private gym that offers both personal training and small group classes. It makes my life as both a business owner/operator AND a personal trainer/instructor SO much easier! Whenever I’ve had questions or need anything no matter how simple, when I reach out, tech support is there with a timely answer and easy to follow instructions. My clients love it, too as it makes it super easy for them! Its win/win. Hands down, work with FitDEGREE to take work off of you and help you level up your studio or gym!

Review.Titre: One of best things I ever did for my studio
Review.Contenu: One of the best things I ever did for my studio was switch from my previous software to FitDegree.  I always feel supported when I need them and the software is intuitive for users and for us on the staff end.

Review.Titre: Trainer and business owner
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE has done very well for our studio! It’s easy to work with when it comes to booking, purchasing and seeing the schedule. Best part for me would be the announcements, as a business owner, communication is key whether we are doin a challenge, meal prepping, class cancels, change in schedule, FYI’s and much more. Notifications are also great!

Review.Titre: Nick and the staff at fitDEGREE have…
Review.Contenu: Nick and the staff at fitDEGREE have been the best!  They are genuinely concerned about your understanding of the software, your business, and the best way to integrate. They are very transparent, and I appreciate the honesty from the top down. As a small business owner that has struggled through COVID, I am so grateful that fitDEGREE and my paths have crossed! Here is to a brighter future!

Review.Titre: Great platform for our studio's staff…
Review.Contenu: Great platform for our studio's staff and clients. Always quick response time from fitDEGREE team when support is needed. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: FitDEGREE is an amazing studio software…
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE is an amazing studio software system, the best choice for my business! Owners are honest and quick to respond to any questions or issues (which have been very few). If you’re looking to switch from your existing booking software I highly recommend them, the data transfer was easy with little manual work.

Review.Titre: The entire experience has been great
Review.Contenu: The entire experience has been great.  Their customer service has been top notch.  Great communication. On the software end we love everything about it.  It is very user friendly. In the short time we have used it we see our clients becoming more engaged. We notice less marketing needed to fill our workshops and events. Making the move from MindBody has been a plus on all aspects.

Review.Titre: I had a responce to my query in the…
Review.Contenu: I had a responce to my query in the time frame I requested. Problem resolved and additional resolutions coming soon via personal zoom session to address a specific need. There are not enough words to express how much I appreciate fitDegree software and the team. I am not tech savvy and they are quick to respond to my help request. They have made many upgrades to the software at user requests. They really listen to the needs of their client base. The pricing of the software kept my businees  functioning through closures of the last few years. I am so grateful I found fitDegree and the BEST problem solvers in the industry! Thanks Nick and the fitdegree Team!

Review.Titre: fitDEGREE has it all
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE has it all!  We searched years for a system we could trust and easily navigate.  Not only for our clients, but for us as small business owners. We have used a few other companies and this is by far the most organized system.  There's a button and option for everything we need.  The service team at fitDegree is exceptional!  They are easy to get ahold of and have fast, prompt responses.  We would recommend FitDegree 10/10 times!

Review.Titre: I love FitDegree
Review.Contenu: I love FitDegree. Ease of use for both consumer and admin sides, excellent customer service, chat and share features within the app are all wonderful.

Review.Titre: I recommend fitDegree
Review.Contenu: FitDegree's onboarding, customer service, and value are excellent. We use it for our group fitness studio, mainly for classes and events. They typically get back to you within a few hours if you have a question. FitDegree listens to their customers' feedback and have made many upgrades to the app and interface since we started working with them back in 2019. We love having our own branded app, and we are so glad we made the switch from Mindbody.

Review.Titre: Highly Recommend fitDEGREE
Review.Contenu: I switched from MindBody to fitDEGREE and am so happy I did.  My clients find it so much easier to book online using the app.  I loved all the training and support I received when I was getting set up.  The support had been amazing.  I can't think Ali enough for all the help she has given me and the many questions she has patiently answered for me. I hight recommend fitDEGREE.

Review.Titre: Easily the best fitness software out…
Review.Contenu: Easily the best fitness software out there. I have used other softwares for client booking, running reports, etc. and this is by FAR the best I have ever used. The ease and accessibility is unmatched. Customer service is 11/10 and as a Pilates Studio owner, Nick and his team make it SO easy for clients to book and admin to do anything from adding classes to the schedule to running reports a breeze. I get compliments all the time about how easy the app is to use. THANK YOU!!!

Review.Titre: Software is perfect
Review.Contenu: Great service, easy to use software for the studio and students, and literally nothing ever goes wrong. I have had zero problems!

Review.Titre: The right choice for a small business
Review.Contenu: The crew at FitDegree is always helpful and responsive.  Occasionally there are issues with the software (as with any software- I've been with another) but I can always count on getting support in a timely fashion. As a small business owner, it's important to me that I know I can get help when I need it.  I used another company for several years and it was more expensive, more cumbersome, and the team was not at all supportive. We've used FitDegree since we reopened during the pandemic and have been very pleased.

Review.Titre: fitDEGREE is amazing!
Review.Contenu: I cannot speak highly enough of fitDEGREE. They are an excellent company. Not only did the CEO reach out personally in our first introduction, he reached out when we sadly closed our studio. We connected with Megan, who helped us switch everything over from our prior operating system when we first signed up. She did this seamlessly and made sure all of our data was imported. fitDEGREE provided all the materials needed for our clients and staff to easily make the switch. They are so friendly and every time I had a question, they immediately responded and gave the help needed. If you are looking for a fitness or wellness booking software, you should run to fitDEGREE.

Review.Titre: FitDEGREE makes the life of a small…
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE makes the life of a small business owner and private gym-studio owner a lot easier. I’m much more agile in my offerings - even offering special temporary deals to clients as well as introductory offers that help attract new clients and retain clients. If I have a question or need to check whether I’ve done something right, support gets back to me right away! I appreciate FitDEGREE!

Review.Titre: Best customer service
Review.Contenu: We've been with fitDEGREE since opening our studio. Although there's an occasional glitch after an update, I don't believe we could find a company with better customer service. The staff members truly care about your business and success and are happy to help. It's rare to find customer service this good! Our members like that they can invite their friends through the app to classes.

Review.Titre: I moved my studio software over to…
Review.Contenu: I moved my studio software over to FitDEGREE in 2020 after six years with another company and haven’t had any regrets. The service is wonderful. They get back to you right away and communicate directly should you have any issues, no matter how big or small. FitDEGREE customer service is amazing and it’s clear that they really care about their clients.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service always!
Review.Contenu: I've worked with FitDegree in the past as a yoga studio manager. I am now opening my own studio and knew I would use them based on how great they were to work with then. They have an exceptional level of customer service as well as well as an easy-to-use platform that doesn't break the bank.

Review.Titre: I wish I made the switch sooner!
Review.Contenu: I was nervous to make the switch from MBO because we had used it for so long but am so happy I did!  Not only has fitDEGREE saved me money, it's making our sign in process much more efficient allowing teachers more time to interact with the students!  Any questions that have come up, the fitDEGREE team have quickly answered for me making this transition to our new norm as seamless as possible.

Review.Titre: You won't find a better customer…
Review.Contenu: You won't find a better customer experience for yourself; Nick and the staff are amazing and really care about their clients.  My own clients love the app's social features - they love being able to see who of their friends are signed up for classes.  One of my personal favorite features of the app is the Announcements.  I can create a post that gets pushed to everyone's app so they see it as a notification on their phone.  It's a great way to get news and Promos out to my clients.

Review.Titre: Simply outstanding customer service
Review.Contenu: Simply outstanding customer service. No software is perfect, but they do find solutions and workarounds for any issues I've come across. I also feel confident that they are continuously working to make improvements based on client feedback. I feel very well cared for and it is a huge relief coming from my experience with my previous studio software. Our app has gotten great feedback and the students love the social features. The reporting is helpful and easy to interpret. Scheduling is a breeze. I'm very happy with our decision.

Review.Titre: Great Experience
Review.Contenu: The owner and staff of fitDEGREE are really outstanding to work with. They are genuinely interested in the success of your business and are not just money hungry. If you're looking for a solid scheduling platform with quick response times, this is the one to choose!

Review.Titre: We LOVE Fit Degree!
Review.Contenu: Fit Degree has been amazing and so smooth. Setting everything up was so easy with the help of the Fit Degree team. The customer service is on top of it. Our clients love the app and always rave about how easy it is us it. Plus, it's affordable. I highly recommend Fit Degree!!

Review.Titre: FitDegree is essential for my business
Review.Contenu: FitDegree as a program is easy to use and a great tool for my business. The owner and staff are great to work with and always help me in a timely manner whenever I need. The custom app is really slick and my clients use it daily to schedule classes and receive push notifications from me in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: 6 out of 5 Stars!
Review.Contenu: We moved from Mindbody to Fitdegree in the summer of 2021. It continues to be one of the best decisions I've made for both of my studios. The software is user-friendly from an admin and client perspective. The customer service team at FD is unparalleled, and we're saving lots of money!

Review.Titre: Glad I made the switch
Review.Contenu: As a start up in a world where there is MindBody, I knew I was taking a risk. But, it was well worth it and I am not sorry I switched. The software continues to get better and better and functions in a way that is much more intuitive than MindBody was. The people behind FitDEGREE genuinely care about their customers and continually prove it by implementing feedback and continually exploring ways to add value. If you are thinking about making the switch, I highly recommend FitDEGREE.

Review.Titre: fitDEGREE has been a great fit for our Yoga Studio
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE has been a great fit for our studio needs and continues to add new features to its software. It has been affordable, reliable even with some update bugs from time to time, and exactly what we needed to run our new yoga studio. The customer service is incredible and I have not experienced tech support for when issues or questions come up like this before. They are on it!Along with us our customers find it easy and intuitive to use and operate.  Creating classes, events, or series is simple and just makes sense.

Review.Titre: We love fitDegree and the support team…
Review.Contenu: We love fitDegree and the support team is always a quick note away from the help you need. Everyone is very professional and courteous while solving your business needs, great platform and an even better group of folks to work with!

Review.Titre: Honestly...
Review.Contenu: Honestly.... this is too good to be true. We interviewed a million software companies and you were the final one... save the best for last....The features you offer on the app are cutting edge... Appealing to the students because it is intune with their daily routine using social media...they don't skip a beat. All the bonus features, like friending people, seeing how full a class is, events posted as if it were an ad and I can't wait to use the video promos. Owning 5 studios with 40+ teachers, it's hard to spread the word about sales, workshops and events but now the students see it every time they sign up..BOOM!Seriously, thank you for helping us along the way. FD will be dominating the market soon.. good luck

Review.Titre: Community building, customer service and dedication to the most innovative software on the market
Review.Contenu: Starting a new virtual fitness company has been a feat like none other. Fortunately, I found fitDEGREE at just the right time. I am thrilled with the options available for community building in the app, the amazing customer service, and the dedication this team has to make its product the best it can be. Thank you so, so, so much to Dan, Megan, and the rest of fitDEGREE for providing the next the future of fitness member management software. Best decision EVER!

Review.Titre: You will not find better customer…
Review.Contenu: You will not find better customer service, hands down.  They are meticulous with the features they roll out - all the things they have added are done very well (not just thrown out so they can claim to have the feature).  We actually left fitDEGREE last summer for a bigger, more well-known app, thinking we wanted all the bells and whistles they advertised.  Needless to say, we just switched BACK to fitDEGREE after we realized that 1.) Our Clients really LOVED the fitDEGREE app, and a year later were still wishing for it and 2.) The customer service of the big company does NOT hold a candle to the team at fitDEGREE.   I wish we hadn't left!

Review.Titre: Straightforward, approachable and user friendly
Review.Contenu: I've been with FitDegree for 3 years and they have been a responsive and responsible partner that is dedicated to understanding your business needs and is clear about how it can meet them without hidden fees. This is a great Fitness CRM solution with integrity and a thoughtful, personal approach. This is not an all-in-one service, that's what integrations are for y'all.

Review.Titre: I cannot rave enough about the customer…
Review.Contenu: I cannot rave enough about the customer support offered here. Every question is answered promptly and in full detail. They really go above and beyond to make sure your business is running smoothly. I am so thankful for FitDEGREE and their am amazing staff !!!!!!!  As business owners, there are enough headaches out there that we deal with on a daily basis, thank GOD FitDEGREE is never one of them

Review.Titre: I've been with FitDEGREE for nearly two…
Review.Contenu: I've been with FitDEGREE for nearly two years and I love them. They’ve been so supportive & helpful during this last (crazy) year and have really gone above and beyond. Everything else with my business has been a big question mark this year with everything going on and the only thing I’ve felt confident about is keeping my business with them. I can’t recommend them enough.

Review.Titre: Soooo happy I switched to fitDEGREE
Review.Contenu: Soooo happy I switched to fitDEGREE! I wish I would have made the transition sooner. Super user friendly and easy to make changes to my own business as my clients needs evolve. (No feeling like you need a specific degree to run or make changes in the system)  Dan helped me set everything up and is always quick to respond if I have a question. I couldn't be happier with the move!

Review.Titre: NO REGRETS!!!
Review.Contenu: The customer service and personalized attention you get with Fit Degree is unparalleled. We have switched over both our studios and it's one of the best business decisions we've ever made! It's user friendly and easy to use.

Review.Titre: Amazing customer support and simple/intuitive interface.
Review.Contenu: The support recieved throughout the setup and transition was great. Couldnt have been smoother with great response time to requests/questions.The support also recieved post transition is hands down one of the best features of going with FitDegree. Their customer support makes sure you get what you need and is extremely fast and personal. The app and admin system is very intuitive and easy to use. The reports functions are again very easy to use and several features allow much easier client managment. Instructor managment is so simple and makes payment and scheduling so much easier. Training is great and copies of all the meetings are provided for reference. If you cant figure out what you need again the customer support is great. Client feedback has been great. The app on their side is a great improvment over Mindbody and we have seen online registrations jump as soon as we switched. Very happy with the switch and the FitDegree team.

Review.Titre: Fit degree is amazing
Review.Contenu: Fit degree is amazing. The software is fantastic and the team is easy to work with. I have had zero issues. I also enjoy this software much more than any others that I have used. The layout is clear cut and easy to use- from the business side as well as the customer side.

Review.Titre: I absolutly love fitDegree
Review.Contenu: I absolutly love fitDegree. The amount of time i have to spend on running my business is mad eeasier and simmpler with this software. I very rarely have any issues, if I do it is easy to find a video or contact fitDegree Helpdesk and get a fast reply. When i get a helpdesk rely it is language that i understand. I am not tech savvy and they alwasy word it where i can follow the direction with confidence and resolve any issue. I do have a request and it is seems more asthetic that function howeer, being a lone rager running my business it would be useful to have the ability to color code the class groups.I am over 2 years in and I am so glad I switched. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Great business partner!
Review.Contenu: I am the owner of a small boutique yoga studio located in Atlanta, GA. I cannot stress how great it is to work with FitDegree! It is easy, seamless and a high level of customer service is always provided. I am so glad I made the decision to partner with FitDegree over a year plus ago. I highly recommend them!

Review.Titre: Best thing we could have done!
Review.Contenu: We made our transition to fitDEGREE during the pandemic and it is the best thing we could have done. It has simplified the amount of administrative work involved with live streaming classes. No crazy gimmicks just a solid product and a wonderful on boarding and support team.

Review.Titre: This is the best
Review.Contenu: This is the best, most user friendly, innovative scheduling/POS platform on the market. Their customer service is top notch and they continue to upgrade and enhance the system on a monthly basis. Switching to fitDEGREE was one of the best studio business decision I’ve made.

Review.Titre: Worth every penny!!
Review.Contenu: When I purchased an existing studio that had fitDEGREE in place, I had many questions. But I am so happy this was the platform in place!! We had some major issues with the change over and not because of fitDEGREE. But when those issues came up I was able to talk to a person to figure out what the best plan of action was. Nick talked me through it, gave me reassurance that they would take care of it and really went above and beyond!! I can not say enough about fitDEGREE!! Any time I have questions I can email and the response is very timely and sometimes includes a step by step video. Thank you fitDEDREE!!!

Review.Titre: If you want support and community, this is the software for you.
Review.Contenu: Fabulous group of caring people. If you want support and community, this is the software for you. They are super easy to get a hold and they are constantly evolving. They care about each client and take feedback and work requests out quickly. Simple, easy software that has everything I need and the little things that I want are already in development. Their integration with Mail Chimp is seemless. (Last company was so complicated that their integration was rarely reliable and very glitchy.) After 10 years with another software, I am so glad I switched.

Review.Titre: Thrilled with our choice to go with fitDEGREE.
Review.Contenu: We are really happy with fitDEGREE for our studio client management software. It does just about everything we need it to do, and even for the things it doesn’t, the team is very responsive and understanding with feature requests and updates. We absolutely love how stoked they are to support smaller and new businesses and how hands-on everyone is, right down to the founders. We have been so impressed every step of the way with our onboarding process and their staff’s patience with all of our questions, particularly since there is a 6 hour time difference between the fitdegree staff and our studio. Really love that there are other great options out there at better price points than Mindbody. Will definitely be recommending other businesses use fitdegree.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer service! Nick is awesome and always there with a quick response. FitDEGREE has a family feel, they are reliable and the software is easy to use. I love their vibe and have so much peace knowing they have my back and are trustworthy. I have loved using fitDEGREE for my small Pilates business!

Review.Titre: LOVE fitDEGREE
Review.Contenu: LOVE fitDEGREE! Smooth transition from MindBody, EXCELLENT customer service, and the software and app are user friendly! I’m very happy I made the switch! FitDEGREE truly cares about their clients!

Review.Titre: EVERY communication has been great!
Review.Contenu: EVERY communication that I have had with fitDEGREE has been positive!  They respond quickly.  They answer my questions.  They refer me to resources for additional help.  I am not a technology wizard and fitDEGREE is patient with me and doesn’t try to take advantage of my lack of skill or hesitations with the technical part of my work. I have had a great experience with Ali and Christine.  They are very personable and helpful.  I never feel like an imposition or that my questions are insignificant.  Thank you fitDEGREE!

Review.Titre: fitDEGREE offers an excellent product…
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE offers an excellent product and the very BEST customer service. They are always looking for ways to make their amazing software even better. One way they do this is by listening to their clients! I highly recommend this product and the entire fitDEGREE team!

Review.Titre: The fitDEGREE team is exceptional
Review.Contenu: The fitDEGREE team is exceptional, and Nick is excellent! Working through a rough transition, Nick's understanding, guidance, and need for us to succeed were more than I could have asked for or imagined from a company. Thank you, fitDEGREE team!

Review.Titre: We are so happy we made the switch to…
Review.Contenu: We are so happy we made the switch to fitDEGREE. Our students love the app and so do we. fitDEGREE does everything we need it to do and is incredibly responsive. Christine Heavener is our coach and she is the cherry on top of the Sunday! She guides us in the right directions, answers our questions quickly and thoroughly (we love the Loom videos), and ensures that we never feel stressed about fitDEGREE doing what we need it to do. Did we say we were so happy we made the switch? Well, we can't say it enough!

Review.Titre: Recommend on EVERY level
Review.Contenu: Recommend on EVERY level! Easy to use, support is Amazing! New features are introduced all the time - FitDegree has made running our studio 10000% easier than the headache of other software programs.

Review.Titre: Phenomenal
Review.Contenu: FitDegree has been incredible. I was fortunate enough to get started with them from the beginning and they have been incredible to work with. They’ve customized things specifically for my needs and simplified the administration part of my business so I can do what I love and work with clients!! Nick and his team are phenomenal!! 🙌

Review.Titre: It’s user friendly on all sides
Review.Contenu: It’s user friendly on all sides. It helps us focus on our client  experience. It added systems & ease to running our business. The support/customer service staff is prompt & stellar!

Review.Titre: fitDEGREE has been a dream come true…
Review.Contenu: fitDEGREE has been a dream come true for our boutique fitness studio. We had to kiss quite a few toads to find our prince but it was worth it! The design, the interface, the ease of use and the constant improvements are just a few of our favorite things. Thank you, FitFam, for all you do for us "little guys".

Review.Titre: FitDEGREE has been the best software…
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE has been the best software for my group fitness studio!   They are always updating the systems based on customer feedback & are very quick to respond to inquiries.  Very friendly too!

Review.Titre: After trying Vagaroo and WellnessLiving…
Review.Contenu: After trying Vagaroo and WellnessLiving for my yoga studio, I stumbled upon fitDEGREE. Thank goodness! I was unhappy with my prior services due to hidden fees,  poor customer support and difficult navigation. I appreciate FD because of the personal attention given to my staff and customers as well as their straightforward pricing structure. I will be staying with them for as long as I can!

Review.Titre: The fitDEGREE team never ceased to…
Review.Contenu: The fitDEGREE team never ceased to exceed expectations.  They are kind and enthusiastic about the services they provide, their enthusiasm truly seels to be inspired by their clients. They want you to succeed so they do not stop working,, walking you through your questions,, providing excellent training material. I could go on.

Review.Titre: Quick response to any issues or…
Review.Contenu: Quick response to any issues or concerns. Easy to use.Our members love using it.I love the display or look of the app in use.The announcement feature is awesome.Members complain;When they have a bill past due they are not able to fix the problem on their own through the app. I don't know what this looks like on their end if it is user error or they actually can not pay a past due bill through the app on their own. Sometimes the app is slow.I am so happy we decided to go with fit-degree and I recommend it when ever I can.

Review.Titre: Aaahhhhhhhmazing!!!!!
Review.Contenu: FitDegree has been the easiest software to use to build my business.  Nick and his team have been amazing to work with and have made the craziness of the administrative side of business EASY!! You won't regret using FitDegree!!

Review.Titre: Flexible & customizable!!
Review.Contenu: We were one of the initial companies that teamed up with FitDegree during the development stage. It was been incredible to work with Nick & the team at FitDegree. They are helpful, responsive and genuinely care about creating a tool that minimizes the “administrative” part of our job. I’m grateful for the flexibility of the software to customize classes, events or one-on-ones.  They’ve made the administrative management portion of my job streamlined and easy!!

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service!
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer service!! Christine has been so helpful throughout our transition process. As far as FitDEGREE it self, clients are loving how easy it  is use.

Review.Titre: Working with fitdegree is the best…
Review.Contenu: Working with fitdegree is the best decision I could have made. Their personal, friendly and supportive. The software interface is intelligent and simple, and someone challenged by technology needs that. Personal service is important to me. They took the time to understand my concerns and nerves about opening my studio and made the admin part of the process comfortable.

Review.Titre: fitDegree has been a breath of fresh…
Review.Contenu: fitDegree has been a breath of fresh air, a little bit a a learning curve, but well worth it.  The tech support is awesome, and I love that they listen to their customers for improvements.

Review.Titre: We love fitDEGREE at our yoga studio.
Review.Contenu: We are so thankful that we found fitDEGREE for our yoga studio. It is simple but not basic. The team is always helpful and responsive to requests and calls for help. Thank you fitDEGREE!

Review.Titre: My Onboarding Experience with fitDEGREE and Christine Heavener
Review.Contenu: My onboarding experience with fitDEGREE was positive in every way. Christine Heavener was my onboarding coach and she was fantastic. She was a wealth of knowledge and presented all all of the material i needed to learn in an organized and meaningful fashion. She sent me an email before we met each time stating exactly what we would cover and left me with specific homework to complete for the next time we met. She recorded each session and sent them to me for reference. l am a visual learner and Christine accented that in her teachings. She always made time for questions and never made me feel like I was asking too many of them. I felt like I was Christine's only client. She was so focused on my new studio and needs and remembered all the details I told her about it from one session to the next. Christine even helped me with some changes on my website to make booking classes easier for my clients. I feel like I can reach out with a question that may come up down the road and Christine will be there for me. I am so happy I chose fitDEGREE!

Review.Titre: LOVE the fitDEGREE platform
Review.Contenu: Moving over to the fitDEGREE platform has been the best decision ever for my cycling studio. Seamless transition, easy and fun platform for my members and amazing (seriously second to none) customer service for me as a business owner/administrator of the platform. It is the most important resource for running my business and I 100% trust the fitDEGREE team as they continue to make the platform better and better. They listen to user suggestions and implement them in an even better manner than the users imagined. They are always thinking of their users and consistently do the right thing. It's fun to see them grow but continue to be 'touchable' and successful with their service-centric foundation. Oh! And they are WAY MORE reasonably priced than any other platform out there. Go fitDEGREE!

Review.Titre: Great Studio Software
Review.Contenu: I’ve been with FitDEGREE since 2020 after having used another, bigger software company for about 7 years. FitDEGREE has great customer service and provides an excellent product!

Review.Titre: So happy I switched from Mindbody
Review.Contenu: So happy I switched from Mindbody.  The customer service is amazing and the software is very user friendly for both the business owner and the studio clients.  The switch over was super easy and I don't regret it.

Review.Titre: The support and assistance with fit…
Review.Contenu: The support and assistance with fit degree is unparalleled! They are always quick to help solve a problem or walk me through something in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Its the onboarding which makes the…
Review.Contenu: Its the onboarding which makes the difference. I understand that things can go wrong in a software, but the continuous, efficient communication and assistance is GREAT. The software is also perfect to my needs and very reasonable too. I would definitely recommend.

Review.Titre: My experience with Fitdegree has been…
Review.Contenu: My experience with Fitdegree has been amazing! I'm so happy I made the switch from Mindbody. In the first week, I had 6 new auto pays!EmilyTrue Moon Yoga - Annapolis

Review.Titre: FitDEGREE was excellent in all ways
Review.Contenu: FitDEGREE was excellent in all ways. What a refreshing experience after switching from another leading industry program. They were prompt, went above and beyond for customer service and my staff and students frequently remarked how easy it was to use.

Review.Titre: The fitDEGREE app is outstanding for…
Review.Contenu: The fitDEGREE app is outstanding for both a business and the client.  The ease of use and quality is high.  Staff are super responsive and knowledgeable.  We are grateful to use it!

Review.Titre: Trial Run!
Review.Contenu: I am still waiting for my studio to open, but have been using FitDegree to host small events. So far, its been easy for participants to access the app and sign up for classes!

Review.Titre: I love Fit Degree
Review.Contenu: I love Fit Degree! Before this app, attendance in the group fitness classes was first come, first serve. Fit Degree gives security knowing that I don't have to RUN to class and wait in a line for 15-minutes. My spot is waiting for me when I arrive!

Review.Titre: Functional, Affordable & Best Customer Service
Review.Contenu: fitDegree is a wonderfully functional, affordable and social app. Beyond that, it is backed by a team that truly cares about their clients and provides top notch customer service. I would recommend this app to anyone with a fitness business looking to make client booking, employee scheduling and financial tracking simple and cost effective.

Review.Titre: FitDegree has been amazing to work with…
Review.Contenu: FitDegree has been amazing to work with since the beginning. I appreciate a company that is personable, supportive, and solves any issues within moments. Working with FitDegree has boosted my business + Given me the ability to grow and thrive. I highly recommend using them.

Review.Titre: Excellent system
Review.Contenu: Excellent system! I am really pleased with how much effort they put into making it even better day after day, adding features and improving the performance.

Review.Titre: We love FitDegree!
Review.Contenu: We love FitDegree! It's super easy to use and there is always amazing customer support when we need it. I highly recommend FitDegree!!

Review.Titre: I loved how fitDEGREE was able to help…
Review.Contenu: I loved how fitDEGREE was able to help streamline my fitness business.  The onboarding process was excellent and very supportive.  Their management team always goes over and beyond with help.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Change is hard. I switched to fitDregree from a different company.  Their customer service is 2nd to none. They did everything they could to make the process smooth. I also just really like everyone I've worked with there. And.....I'm excited to be saving a ton of money and have my own branded app.

Review.Titre: Customer service is awesome
Review.Contenu: Customer service is awesome! They are always looking for ways to improve the software while listening to our needs and desires.

Review.Titre: Love FitDegree
Review.Contenu: Love FitDegree. They are super helpful and really listen to their clients. I recommend this app to anyone looking for software to accompany their business.

Review.Titre: Best decision I've made for my studio
Review.Contenu: Best decision I've ever made for my small yoga studio to switch to FitDegree!  AMAZING customer service and easy to navigate software.

Review.Titre: Clean software design that’s easy to…
Review.Contenu: Clean software design that’s easy to use, and helpful staff for new people. Actual customer service!!

Review.Titre: Love fitDEGREE!
Review.Contenu: As a new business, we are so thankful for fitDEGREE. They have helped us every step of the way to make sure our business is set-up for success. Thank you, fitDEGREE!

Review.Titre: Super responsive customer service
Review.Contenu: Super responsive customer service! Our members and instructors alike all are LOVING the system and branded app!
